casebody.data:
PAUL C. SCHOTTE, PROSECUTOR, v. BOARD OF COMMISSIONERS OF THE TOWN OF IRVINGTON, DEFENDANT. Argued January 23, 1931 Decided February 13, 1931.

Before Gummeee, Chief Justice, and Justice Campbell.

Eor the prosecutor, Edward A. & William A. Schilling. Eor the defendant, Charles H. Stewart. Pee Cueiam.

A consideration of the facts presented and the arguments; of counsel made brings us to the conclusion that the application for the writ should be denied.

Such an order may be had and entered.
